message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for considering me for your product. I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, I'm looking for a price closer to $13,000.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product. This is my final offer within my budget constraints.
